moon.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • moon.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to store the information of a course. It contains all the units that compose the course, all the students that have been accepted, all the students that have been expeled, all the MCourses (marks of the students), and all the applications that students have made to the course.
    Author:
    Juan Riera and Lucia Asencio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
